#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int ma = 0, n, m, x;

int main()
{
    scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int mi = 2000000000;
        for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
            scanf("%d", &x);
            mi = min(mi, x);
        }
        ma = max(ma, mi);
    }
    printf("%d\n", ma);
}
